org.jepria.oauth.token.rest

Class TokenJaxrsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jepria.server.service.rest.JaxrsAdapterBase
      • org.jepria.oauth.token.rest.TokenJaxrsAdapter

  • @Path(value="/token")
public class TokenJaxrsAdapter
extends org.jepria.server.service.rest.JaxrsAdapterBase
    The token endpoint is used by the client to obtain an access token by presenting its authorization grant or refresh token. The token endpoint is used with every authorization grant except for the implicit grant type (since an access token is issued directly).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.jepria.server.service.rest.JaxrsAdapterBase
